mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(company_id, notice_title, notice_period, notice_dept, notice_position, notice_task, notice_sal, notice_qual, notice_career, notice_wellfare, job_id) VALUES(#{companyId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticePeriod},#{noticeDept},#{noticePosition},#{noticeTask},#{noticeSal},#{noticeQual},#{noticeCareer}, #{noticeWellfare},#{jobId})
mapper.select: SELECT n.*, i.new_image_name FROM notice n INNER JOIN intro_image i ON n.company_id = i.company_id ORDER BY n.notice_period DESC

SELECT ni.* FROM (SELECT n.*, i.new_image_name FROM notice n INNER JOIN intro_image i ON n.company_id = i.company_id) ni INNER JOIN job j ON ni.job_id = j.job_id WHERE j.job_code = #{jobCode} ORDER BY ni.notice_period DESC

SELECT n.notice_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_task, n.notice_career, n.notice_qual, n.notice_position, DATE_FORMAT(n.notice_period, '%Y.%m.%d') as notice_period, n.job_id FROM notice n INNER JOIN (SELECT ec.job_id FROM emp_check ec INNER JOIN employee e ON ec.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE ec.employee_id = #{employeeId}) ec ON n.job_id = ec.job_id ORDER BY n.notice_period DESC
SELECT * FROM notice n INNER JOIN subscribe s ON n.company_id = s.company_id WHERE s.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT nj.*, ii.intro_id, ii.intro_coname, ii.intro_birth, ii.intro_task, ii.intro_sal, ii.intro_wellfare, ii.intro_content, ii.intro_location, ii.new_image_name FROM (SELECT n.*,j.job_name FROM notice n INNER JOIN job j ON n.job_id = j.job_id) nj INNER JOIN ( SELECT i.*, img.new_image_name FROM intro i INNER JOIN intro_image img ON i.intro_image_id = img.intro_image_id) ii ON nj.company_id = ii.company_id WHERE nj.notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_period = #{noticePeriod}, notice_dept = #{noticeDept}, notice_position = #{noticePosition}, notice_task = #{noticeTask}, notice_sal = #{noticeSal}, notice_qual = #{noticeQual}, notice_career = #{noticeCareer}, notice_wellfare = #{noticeWellfare}, job_id = #{jobId} WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
